Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. It comes with a wealth of features and benefits designed to enhance your experience. Considering its quality and the effort put into it, I believe it's worth more than $120. Would you be interested in acquiring it for $150? This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value we place on providing exceptional products to our customers. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
